metadata.dc:author: Alvarez Díaz, Jorge Alberto
metadata.dc:description: The work begins with historical considerations about the development of embryology at the beginning of the twentieth century and the vast advance obtained to the arriving of complex assisted reproductive techniques. Afterwards it is reviewed the development of variants and possibilities of the techniques. Finally, it is proposed four historic periods regarding the development of complex assisted reproductive technologies.
metadata.dc:title: Historia contemporánea: las técnicas complejas de reproducción asistida.
[Contemporaneous history: complex techniques of assisted reproduction].
